import React from 'react' // import productImg from '../../../assets/images/product_2.1.jpg' import "../../../styles/product-card.css" import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { cartActions } from '../../../store/shopping-cart/cartSlice'; const ProductCard = (props) => { const {id,title,image01, price} = props.item const dispatch = useDispatch return
{title}
${price}
} export default ProductCard
